string-array.name: greetings
string-array.item: Are you ready to check your workouts, nyapprentice?
The magic was in you all along, you just need to work it out! Meow.
You need a fit body to perform the best magic. Believe me, I\'m buff as heck.
I hope you\'re actually completing the workouts you click in workouts menu, hm?
Remember, you\'re only hurting yourself because you want to. And because I\'m watching you. Meow ho ho.
